questions.question: Which of the issue below was the biggest problem during your experience with Camarada?
choices: I don't have a VR viewer (e.g. Google Cardboard)
I can't find a friend or second phone to capture 3D video
I don't like the quality of 3D videos
I don't know how to use it - it's too complicated

questions.question: Which of the new feature(s) below would you be most interested in (check all that apply)?
choices: Ability to post video to other social sites (e.g. YouTube)
Ability to follow friends, post comments, like videos
Multi-phone mode to record panoramic video

questions.question: Any feedback, comment or feature request that you can share with us?
